plot: Animators from around the world present their fanciful versions of the "academy leader", the piece of filmstock at the beginning of each reel of a movie that counts down the seconds 8-7-6-5-4-3-2.
title: Academy Leader Variations
plot_es: Animators from around the world present their fanciful versions of the "academy leader", the piece of filmstock at the beginning of each reel of a movie that counts down the seconds 8-7-6-5-4-3-2.
